function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of COVID-19 virus in crowded places","Impact":"Spread of the virus, increased cases, and potential for outbreaks","Mitigation":"Improved ventilation, social distancing measures, and surface disinfection","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, UV disinfection, touchless technology, and smart sensors","People":"General public, building occupants, and visitors","Owner":"Building owners, designers, engineers, and architects"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in buildings","Impact":"Poor indoor air quality, increased risk of virus transmission","Mitigation":"Enhanced ventilation systems, air purification technologies, and occupancy control","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air quality monitors, and exhaust fans","People":"Building occupants and workers","Owner":"Building owners, facilities managers, and construction professionals"},{"Description":"Ineffective building design for healthy environment","Impact":"Higher risk of communicable diseases, compromised public health","Mitigation":"Implementation of healthy building design principles, use of innovative technologies","Technologies":"Ergonomic furniture, daylighting systems, green scaping, smart shading, and air quality sensors","People":"General public, occupants, and communities","Owner":"Architects, designers, and building industry professionals"}]}
